conversations.content: You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Where can I find the general study and examination regulations at UTN?
You can find the Allgemeine Studien- und Prüfungsordnung (ASPO) here: [ASPO PDF](https://www.utn.de/files/2024/12/240501_ASPO_L0.pdf).

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Hey, what’s the rulebook for enrollment and re-registration?

Check the Satzung zu Immatrikulation, Rückmeldung und Exmatrikulation: [Enrollment Statute PDF](https://www.utn.de/files/2024/12/241003_ImmaS_L1.pdf).  

### Academic Procedures

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
How do I register for my Master’s thesis?
The registration process is outlined in this document: [Master’s Thesis Registration PDF](https://www.utn.de/files/2025/03/Registration-Masters-thesis-1.pdf).

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Is there a specific regulation for the aptitude test in Master’s programs?

Yes, the Satzung zum Eignungsverfahren für Masterstudiengänge covers this: [Aptitude Test Statute PDF](https://www.utn.de/files/2025/02/250220_Eignungssatzung_L2.pdf).  

### Semester & Lecture Periods

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
When do semesters and lectures start at UTN?

The Satzung über die Semester- und Vorlesungszeiten has the details: [Semester Dates PDF](https://www.utn.de/files/2024/12/231001_Vorlesungszeiten_L0.pdf).  

### Fees & Contributions

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
What’s the basic student contribution fee?

The Satzung zum Grundbeitrag explains the fee structure: [Contribution Fee PDF](https://www.utn.de/files/2024/12/231201_STW_Grundbeitrag.pdf).  

### Recognition of Prior Learning

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Can I get credits for previous studies? How?

Yes, submit an Application for Recognition of Competencies: [Recognition Form PDF](https://www.utn.de/files/2025/02/241212_Application_for_Recognition_of_Competencies.pdf).  

### Research & PhD

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
What are the rules for PhD studies at UTN?
The Promotionsordnung (PromO) regulates doctoral studies: [PhD Regulations PDF](https://www.utn.de/files/2024/12/230401_Promotionsordnung_L0.pdf).

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Does UTN have guidelines for scientific integrity?

Yes, the Statute on good scientific practice applies: [Scientific Integrity PDF](https://www.utn.de/files/2025/03/230401_Satzung-zur-GWP_L0-EN.pdf).  

### Follow-Up Questions

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
I’m applying for a Master’s—where’s the eligibility info?
Check the Satzung zum Eignungsverfahren für Masterstudiengänge: [Aptitude Test PDF](https://www.utn.de/files/2025/02/250220_Eignungssatzung_L2.pdf).

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Is the aptitude test the same for all Master’s programs?

The statute applies broadly, but check your program’s specific requirements in the document.  

### Miscellaneous

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Where can I find UTN’s foundational legal framework?
The Grundordnung outlines the university’s legal structure: [Grundordnung PDF](https://www.utn.de/files/2024/12/241022_Grundordnung_L-4.pdf).

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
How are official announcements made at UTN?

The Bekanntmachungssatzung governs announcements: [Announcements PDF](https://www.utn.de/files/2024/12/230102_Bekanntmachungssatzung_L0.pdf).  

These pairs cover key topics while using natural phrasing and direct links from the text. Let me know if you'd like adjustments!
